description: a(n+1) = a(n) op n, where op is successively +, *, -.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a047908 n = a047908_list !! (n-1)a047908_list =   1 : zipWith ($) (zipWith ($) (cycle [(+),(*),(-)]) a047908_list) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 13 2011
author: Miklos SZABO (mike(AT)ludens.elte.hu)
